name: The Subway (TopHatMuffin)
description:
Interactive fiction work created for the Global Game Jam 2023 about taking public transit - enjoy riding a train and thinking about too many things, or nothing at all. Having music available is recommended if you listen to music on a train for maximum effect. If you don't, then don't! 

Currently has 1 font option that may be easier for dyslexic people, hoping to have more options in the future. 

Currently in 'jam' version, hoping to do more work on it throughout the week and make it pretty. Thanks for playing!
